item.title: Dark Sign
item.description:
Dark Sign

March 17, 2025

“The Darksign signifies an accursed Undead. Those branded with it are reborn after death, but will one day lose their mind and go Hollow.”

“Death triggers the Darksign, which returns its bearer to the last bonfire rested at, but at the cost of all humanity and souls.”

item.title: Dark Souls - Praise the Sun
item.description:
• Dark Souls - Solaire of Astora
  • Quotes
  • Links

Dark Souls - Solaire of Astora

March 15, 2025

“I am a warrior of the sun! Spot my summon signature easily by its brilliant aura. If you miss it, you must be blind”

Quotes

"We are amidst strange beings, in a strange land.The flow of time itself is convoluted; with heroes centuries old phasing in and out. The very fabric wavers, and relations shift and obscure.There's no telling how much longer your world and mine will remain in contact. But, use this, to summon one another as spirits, cross the gaps between the worlds, and engage in jolly co-operation!"

Links

item.title: Blood Moon
item.description:
• Blood Moon
  • Links

Blood Moon

March 13, 2025

“The red moon hangs low, and beasts rule the streets. Are we left no other choice, than to burn it all to cinders?”

An earlier piece I did to practice comic book drawing, based on the lovely work from Piotr Kowalski and Brad Simpson when I first found that there was a Bloodborne comic at my local comic book shop This was just in time to grab dat total Lunar Eclipse in North America

Links

item.title: Winter Lantern
item.description:
• Bloodborne - Winter Lanterns
  • Links

Bloodborne - Winter Lanterns

January 4, 2025

These unsettling beings hum haunting tunes as they wander the Nightmare of Mensis bringing Frenzy and ruin to any who come too close.

The Winter Lanterns appear as grotesque amalgamations, part brain and part doll-like figure, their gaze alone a harbinger of death.

Beware their hypnotic draw, for Frenzy will overwhelm those unprepared.

Links

item.title: Rykard's Rune
item.description:
• Elden Ring - Abductor Virgins
  • Links

Elden Ring - Abductor Virgins

January 14, 2023

A Great Rune of the shardbearer Rykard. Its blessing restores health on attacking enemies.

Rykard was amongst the children of Rennala and Radagon, who became demigod stepchildren after Radagon’s union with Queen Marika.

But Rykard fed himself to the blasphemous serpent, Great Rune and all.

</p>

Links

item.title: Saturday Morning Soulsborne
item.description:
• Preface
  • Volumes
  • Bloodborne
    • Eileen the Crow
    • The Old Blood
    • A Merry BloodborneTober II
    • Bloodborne in Wonderland
    • Beast’s Embrace
    • Huntsman
  • Elden Ring
    • Malenia - Scarlet Flower
    • Ranni
    • Malenia
    • Miquella
    • Journey to The Lands Between
    • Queen Marika
    • Lord Godfrey
    • Shadow of The Erdtree
    • White Mask Varre
  • Sekiro
    • Wolf
  • Dark Souls
    • Estus Flask

Preface

A compendium of illustrations from the Soulsborne universe I’ve done over the years.

Volumes

  • Elden Ring - On the Nature of Tarnished Souls
  • Bloodborne - Through the Paleblood Looking Glass & Beyond the Hunter’s Dream
  • Sekiro - On the Memories of Deadened Shadows
  • Dark Souls - Whispers Among the Ashen, From the Tales of Hollowed Undead


Bloodborne

Through the Paleblood Looking Glass & Beyond the Hunter’s Dream are volumes from Yharnam’s public library with various accounts taken first hand from individuals involved in the ministration of Pale Blood.

Eileen the Crow

"The Raven Hunter: A hunter with an unusual pair of warped swords. Wears a raven mantle and a doctor's mask, uses bizarre swordsmanship. Well, she seems to be an ally..."

The Old Blood

”That time of the year folks, HALLOWEEN AKA RETURN TO YHARNAM"

A Merry BloodborneTober II

”Oh, a hunter, are ya? And an outsider? What a mess you've been caught up in. And tonight, of all nights. Here, to welcome the new hunter. Prepare yourself for the worst. There are no humans left. They're all flesh-hungry beasts, now."

Bloodborne in Wonderland

"The Plain Doll thought she had never seen such a curious Great One in her existence: its body was sleek and grey, like that of a slug, although from its head sprouted a great many append-ages that twitched when her wooden hands brushed the damp skin." “Are you cold?” The little infant of a cephalopod nature twitched, its sleek skin shining in the moonlight as she held it up to peer at its face. “Oh, Good Hunter.”

Beast’s Embrace

"Those who swear this oath take on a ghastly form and enjoy accentuated transformation effects, especially while wielding a beast weapon."

Huntsman

”You're a hunter with your sanity, aren't you? Must've taken a wrong turn then, eh? Well, we're more alike than you think. This is the Hunter's Nightmare, where hunters end up when drunk with blood. You've seen them before. Aimless, wandering hunters, slavering like beasts. This is what the poor fools have to look forward to. So, don't be brash, turn back before it's too late. Unless, you've something of an interest in nightmares?"

Elden Ring

On the Nature of Tarnished Souls is a collection of accounts from various Tarnished and individuals with considerable knowledge of the past, present, and future of the Lands Between.

Malenia - Scarlet Flower

“Each time the scarlet flower blooms, Malenia’s rot advances. It has bloomed twice already. With the third bloom, she will become a true goddess. I dreamt for so long, my flesh was dull gold, and my blood, rotted. Corpse after corpse, left in my wake… As I awaited… his return. Heed my words. I am Malenia, Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat. Now let your flesh be consumed by the Scarlet Rot!”

Ranni

“This doll's body is not without its hindrances...I shall soon enter my slumber.And it will be some time before I wake.Still, I have high hopes for thee.I look forward to the good news when I arise."

Malenia

"I dreamt for so long. My flesh was dull gold...and my blood, rotted. Corpse after corpse, left in my wake... As I awaited... his return ...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat."

Miquella

"My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god - he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."

Journey to The Lands Between

“Then, after thy death, I will give back what I once claimed. Return to the Lands Between, wage war, and brandish the Elden Ring. Grow strong in the face of death. Warriors of my lord. Lord Godfrey. A Tarnished of no renown. Cross the fog, to the Lands Between, to stand before the Elden Ring. And become the Elden Lord."

Queen Marika

And the Mother's Day award of the year goes to.... Queen Marika! Just look at all her lovely demigod children.

Lord Godfrey

"Hark, my Lord Godfrey. We commend your deeds. Guidance hath delivered ye through to each ordeal, to the place ye stand. Put the Giants to the sword, and confine the flame atop the mount. Let a new epoch begin. An epoch glistening with life. Brandish the Elden Ring, for the Age of the Erdtree!"

Shadow of The Erdtree

“Rise, Tarnished, and let us walk a new path together.”

White Mask Varre

“Oh yes... Tarnished, are we? Come to the Lands Between for the Elden Ring, hmm? Of course you have. No shame in it. Unfortunately for you, however, you are maidenless.”

Sekiro

Sekiro - On the Memories of Deadened Shadows

Wolf

“The day I pulled you from that battlefield, I had no idea what you would become. How many times have you died and come back for me? Once? Twice? Three Times? Or perhaps a number so large it cannot be counted? A Shinobi's eyes do not follow the blade without anticipating its movements. Remaining composed even when the fearful of its sharp edge is the key to victory.”

Dark Souls

Dark Souls - Whispers Among the Ashen, From the Tales of Hollowed Undead

A volume spanning the ages and tales of both grand heros and furtive commonfolk that have weathered the fading light of the world.

Estus Flask

"Soul of the lost, withdrawn from its vessel. Let strength be granted so the world might be mended."

item.title: Baldur's Gate
item.description:
Annotated illustrations fetched from Waterdeep’s public archives and recreations from Gatewardens’ testimonies. This initiative received funding from the Lords of Waterdeep in efforts to counter Mind Flayer activity

×

Baldur's Gate - Illithid

“He who fights with monsters should look to it that he himself does not become a monster...when you gaze into the abyss the abyss also gazes into you... "

Baldur's Gate - Illithid

"You will claw back the truth, but first you must claw your way out of here”

Baldur's Gate - Illithid

“He who fights with monsters should look to it that he himself does not become a monster...when you gaze into the abyss the abyss also gazes into you... "
